attributes.action: Create a Turkish Family Scheme visa for people homeless due to the earthquake
attributes.additional_details: There many Turkish people in the UK whose family are stuck homeless because of the earthquake and are worried about them. The Government should allow Turkish people living in the UK to bring their family members to the UK.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to help and support people in Turkey, officially the Republic of Türkiye, who are homeless and have family in the UK to come to the UK, like the Ukraine Family Scheme visa.
